page.title: 06Employment In Dentdale.
page.content: Dentdale is a farming area which each year attracts more tourists,therefore most jobs are concerned with these. Farmers work long hours,working often without holidays from one year to the next,taking on extra labourers during lambing time and haytime.A farmer's wife is also kept busy helping on the farm,looking after home and family. Local shops,Inns,restaurants and hotels take on extra help nearly all year now as Dentdale becomes more popular. Art and Craft places employ local people for such jobs as printing, knitting,baking,pottery making and serving customers. Holiday Cottages make work for cleaners,while other people are busy with Bed and Breakfast.Builders are kept busy renovating old property. Instructors are used for caving too.
